portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Showcasing my expertise in geospatial analysis and custom development solutions.

items.title: Temporal NDVI Study of Man-Made Forests
items.description: Comprehensive term poster project investigating China's Great Green Wall program to track land use changes, assess new forest health, and analyze weather changes in the Gobi Desert from 2000 to 2022. Employed custom R code to process Landsat imagery into NDVI data from key research zones to derive forest growth areas and relative health of the forests.

image.alt: Temporal NDVI Study Research Project Poster
image.caption: Temporal NDVI Study - China's Great Green Wall Program

additionalImages.alt: Temporal NDVI Study of Man-Made Forests Analysis
additionalImages.caption: Detailed analysis of forest growth patterns and NDVI changes over time

items.title: Santa Barbara Wildfire Analysis
items.description: Used Python to run a supervised classification of Landsat imagery of the Santa Barbara area across 2007, 2008, and 2009 to study the effects of the Jesusita and Gap fires on local vegetation and analyze rates of regrowth. Mapped results using QGIS and associated Landsat imagery bands.

image.caption: Wildfire impact analysis and vegetation regrowth patterns

additionalImages.caption: False color composite analysis of the Santa Barbara area

items.title: Study of Native California Bird Habitat Area Being Lost to Wildfire
items.description: Compiled a decade by decade analysis of wildfire damage to the habitats of the California Condor and Great Gray Owl. Took the CalFIRE historic fire database back to 1900 and color-coded each fire area by decade and clipped the results to the boundaries of the known habitats of both birds of study.

items.title: Agricultural Land Classification
items.description: Supervised classification analysis of farmland areas using remote sensing techniques to identify and map agricultural land use patterns and crop distribution.

image.caption: Farmland classification and agricultural land use mapping

items.title: DGA Transcriber
items.description: Comprehensive Python-based transcription tool with 490+ functions that saves the company $15,000 annually. Features open source AI model integration as a core component, streamlining workflows and automating complex processes. Custom transcription tool built for a Little Hammer Labs customer, featuring advanced audio processing capabilities and automated transcription workflows to streamline document creation and data processing.

trees.title: Trees I've Visited
trees.subtitle: Exploring the world's most remarkable trees and their incredible stories.

items.title: General Sherman - Giant Sequoia
items.description: The largest tree on Earth by volume, found in California's Sequoia National Park

image.alt: General Sherman Tree - Largest Tree on Earth
image.caption: General Sherman Tree - Sequoia National Park

stats.title: World's Largest Tree Statistics:
items: Weight: Estimated 2.7 million pounds (1,244 metric tons)

items.title: Hyperion - Coastal Redwood
items.description: The tallest tree in the world, located in Redwood National Park, California

image.alt: Hyperion Tree - Tallest Tree on Earth
image.caption: Hyperion Tree - Tallest Tree on Earth

stats.title: World's Tallest Tree Statistics:
items: Discovery: Found in 2006 by naturalists Chris Atkins and Michael Taylor

items.title: Methuselah - Ancient Bristlecone Pine
items.description: One of the oldest known living trees on Earth, located in the White Mountains of California

image.alt: Methuselah Tree - One of the Oldest Trees on Earth
image.caption: Methuselah Tree - Ancient Bristlecone Pine

stats.title: World's Oldest Tree Statistics:
items: Species: Pinus longaeva (Great Basin Bristlecone Pine)
Location: White Mountains, Inyo County, California
Discovery: Core sampled in 1957 by Edmund Schulman

sections.title: Education
content: Bachelor of Arts in Geography - University of California, Santa Barbara (2018-2022)
Emphasis in GIS with concentration in Air Photos and Remote Sensing

sections.title: Professional
content: Geospatial Analyst - Leading quality control and workflow improvements
Four years of experience in map creation, spatial analysis, and geodatabase editing with expertise in GIS, Remote Sensing, and Spatial Analysis

image.caption: Remote sensing analysis of water features and hydrological patterns

sections.title: Passion
content: Hiking, Soccer & Outdoor Adventures - Exploring the great outdoors and diverse cultures
Interests include hiking, soccer, spending time outside and with friends, playing games, web development, server administration, building computers, and traveling

sections.title: Skills
content: Programming: Python, R and RStudio, SQL, Mosel, HTML & CSS, JavaScript
GIS Tools: ArcGIS Pro, ArcMap, ArcGIS Online, QGIS, Microsoft Office Suite
GIS Proficiencies: Remote Sensing, Spatial Databases, Spatial Analysis, Data Visualization, Quality Control/Assurance

sections.title: Technology
content: Custom Solutions & AI Integration - Building computers and innovative systems
Co-founder of Little Hammer Labs, delivering fully custom internal solutions and exploring AI integration into daily workflows
